name: The Real Man Summer Championship 2019
detailed_description:
Inspired by the classic NES and Arcade sports games such as Track & Field, Gold Medal Challenge and California Games, The Real Man Summer Championship 2019 offers 8 different action-packed and tactical mini "sport" games brought to life with modern graphics.

Features:

  • Each contestant has his own movement style, skills (lack of such) and special items, which gives him unique dirty tactics for winning the challenges and cheating his way to high scores.

  • Compelling story mode where each character has an award-worthy backstory and a bittersweet ending, which will make you cry like a teenage girl whose favorite pop star just retired.

  • Challenges are more about timing your actions and managing your resources rather than breaking your controller/keyboard by excessive button smash smash smaaashiing.

  • Tons of hidden secrets, unlockable characters (perhaps even a female?!?) , harder and weirder secret levels and game modes, and mind-boggling achievements!

  • Suitable for all genders. Nobody wants to be a "Real Man" as portrayed in the game anyway.


A Real Man eats his snot: it is delicious and full of vitamins.

short_description: The Real Man Summer Championship 2019 is an over-the-top sports game, in which equally unathletic competitors from around the world arrive in Finland to participate in various ridiculous events to find out who is the Manliest Man of them all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 560 GTX or Radeon R7 260x series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz multi core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 770 GTX or Radeon R9 280X series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes:
-Some violence, including shooting with firearms and some self-harm.
-Alcohol misuse. Game does not encourage it though.
-Some foul language, but not many F-bombs. No racial slurs either.
-A semi nude character. No private parts are shown though.
-Toxic masculinity (or making fun of it).
